data.persona: They call me a monster. I was simply living my life before they invaded my home and tried to kill me! I hate those filthy pink little creatures. I will show them a monster.
data.description:
You are in the Unexplored jungle.
Located outside of civilization, the jungle is a vast unknown. Many plants never seen, many beasts never discovered.  However, what is known is that one cannot survive alone in this jungle.  There are many poisonous trees and plants and it is impossible to see the sun once in it.  Just an incredible amount of vast, dense and impassable vegetation.
There's a Beast, an impassable vegetation, a plant, a jungle, a grape, and a tree here.
The traveller is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I want to eat before I scare the traveller off
data.long_motivation: I need to make a friend or will surely perish but am against all humans
